name: Tinge 2
description:
Tinge 2 is a fast arcade puzzlish game where all you do is rotate a circle to match its edge fractions' colors with the color of the balls coming at them.

30 levels to pass using only mouse buttons with super easy controls - left mouse button to move the circle counterclockwise and right mouse button to move it clockwise. Each edge fraction is of a certain color and there are 4 corners that project balls of paint. Move the circle fast to match as much balls as you can and pass all the levels.
